accounts.about: Facebook Pages this person administers/is an admin for.

ad_studies.about: Ad studies that this person can view.

adaccounts.about: The advertising accounts to which this person has access.

adcontracts.about: Insights data for the person's Audience Network apps.

albums.about: The photo albums this person has created.

apprequests.about: This person's pending requests from an app.

books.about: The books listed on this person's profile.

business_activities.about: The business activities related to this user.

curated_collections.about: The curated collections created by this user.

events.about: Events for this person. By default this does not include events the person has declined or not replied to.

favorite_requests.about: Developers' favorite requests to the Graph API.

ids_for_business.about: Business entities can claim ownership of multiple apps using the Business Manager. This edge returns the list of IDs that this user has in any of those other apps.

invitable_friends.about: A list of friends that can be invited to install a Facebook Canvas app.

leadgen_forms.about: A list of lead generation forms belonging to Pages that the user has advertiser permissions on.

likes.about: All the Pages this person has liked.

permissions.about: The permissions that the person has granted this app.

personal_ad_accounts.about: The advertising accounts to which this person has personal access.

photos.about: Photos the person is tagged in or has uploaded.

promotable_domains.about: All the domains user can promote.

promotable_events.about: All the events which user can promote.

session_keys.about: Any session keys that the app knows the user by.

stream_filters.about: A list of filters that can be applied to the News Feed edge.

taggable_friends.about: Friends that can be tagged in content published via the Graph API.

tagged_places.about: List of tagged places for this person. It can include tags on videos, posts, statuses or links.

videos.about: Videos the person is tagged in or uploaded.

checkins.about: The checkins this person has made.

feed.about: The feed of posts (including status updates) and links published by this person.

locations.about: A feed of posts and photos that include location information and in which this person has been tagged. This is useful for constructing a chronology of places that the person has visited.

mutualfriends.about: The list of mutual friends between two people.

notifications.about: The unread Facebook notifications that a person has.

questions.about: The questions that a person has created.

scores.about: The scores this person has received from Facebook Games that they've played.

subscribers.about: The profiles that are following this person.

subscribedto.about: The profile that this person is following.
